newsitem.title: USA: Shuffle Master/IGT game tested in Nevada.
newsitem.headline: Shuffle Master/IGT game tested in Nevada.

text.p: Shuffle Master Inc said Wednesday its recently approved Five Deck Frenzy game is being tested at five Nevada sites, with a sixth site under consideration.
Five Deck Frenzy, recently approved by the Nevada State Gaming Control Board, is the first product from the joint marketing alliance between Shuffle Master and International Game Technology.
The trials are expected to end in June. The game is then expected to be available in the Nevada gaming market and later in additional markets.
